name: Good Garage Scheme
author: Brandified

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to display a Good Garage Scheme widget on your WordPress website.

A Good Garage Scheme account is required in order to use the plugin. Your user ID is then used to show a feed of your reviews and rating.

This plugin was created by Brandified and is not endorsed by The Good Garage Scheme. The plugin relies on a 3rd party (Good Garage Scheme) as a service
sections.installation:
1) After installing, go to Settings > Good Garage Scheme.

2) Copy the shortcode displayed in the blue box.

3) Paste the shortcode into any page on your website, and customise the ‘userid’ and ‘size’ options.
sections.faq:
At the moment Good Garage Scheme only allow two sizes (horizontal and vertical) which are fixed.

Sure. If you would like to display on more than one page then you are free to use as many as you want. You can also include in any sidebar/widget areas including footers etc.
sections.changelog: V1.0 – First release of Good Garage Scheme.
